channel.title: Short Dupe Fix Anyone ? [PI] 5m RSGP for Fix
channel.description:
K i will try it the main thing is that i will need to find a way so if the trade window at the other guy exit's the other guy also exit's
Still don't understand
P1 and P2 Trade If P1 Closes in any other way than clicking close window the trade window for P2 Also closes!
